main.name: Conrad Pereira
main.bio: Driven, curious, and hard-working IT and computer science student. Seeking opportunities for growth and the ability to engage with challenging technical problems.

education.degree: B.S. in Information Systems Management; Minor in Computer Science
education.description: Sept. 2017 - June 2021 | GPA: 3.7/4.0 | Dean’s List Honors

education.school: NCAA DIII Track and Field Athlete
education.description: DIII All Academic Honors. Ranked 36 in the nation in the Decathlon. Student Athlete Advisory Committee as men’s track and field representative.

work.title: Software Engineering R&D Intern
work.description: Lead effort in creating rapid prototype for text summarization to be integrated with SapientX’s Tele assistant. Use Python scripts to answer potential queries within a Zoom meeting, including automatic meeting summarization using natural language processing. Jira software and agile/scrum methods to collaborate and maintain project schedules.

work.title: IT Consultant, Project Manager
work.description: Premier Consulting Group at UC Santa Cruz. Analyzing business data and metrics to help businesses make the most informed decisions. Building and Designing Gesher's website with agile methods to market to B2B clients.

work.company: UCSC Jack Baskin School of Engineering
work.title: Teaching Assistant & Grader
work.description: Assisted groups of 40 students in understanding digital logic circuits, compilation, MIPS assembly language, computer architecture, basic computer hardware/software, and Git/Command line. Debugged, optimized, and graded MML digital logic/MIPS assembly language lab assignments using Python scripts for ~400 students. Collaborated with team of 20 to schedule and teach content. Analyzed C, Java, and SQL lab assignments using Postgres.

work2.title: Cyber Security Intern (Volunteer)
work2.description: Developed secure data model design for LiNKS, an anti-human trafficking web application to allow victims to maintain confidentiality and coordinate with aid organizations.

work2.title: PR/Outreach Volunteer
work2.description: UC Santa Cruz Men's Track and Field representative. Improve quality of life for students on campus and maintain relations between organizations.

work2.title: Marketing/Visibilty Intern
work2.description: Developed infographics and social media posts using Adobe Illustrator and Spark to promote the Plastic Free Seas Campaign, reducing single use plastics, and proposing alternatives to plastics

work2.title: Athletics Event Manager
work2.description: Emceed athletic events, photographed, organized/set up, ticketing, and admissions with basic cash handling certification. Created advertisements and event programs using Adobe Photoshop

work2.title: Life Guard
work2.description: Maintained customer safety using CPR, lifeguard and first-aid certifications. Tested pool’s pH levels and cleaned facilities.

testimonials.text: All that we are is the result of what we have thought.
